mapper.select: select * from user_info order by user_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_nick, user_email, user_phone) values(#{user_id},#{user_pw},#{user_name},#{user_nick},#{user_email},#{user_phone})
mapper.select: select * from user_info where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pw=#{user_pw}
mapper.update: update user_info set user_pw=#{user_pw}, user_nick=#{user_nick} where user_id=#{user_id};
mapper.select: select user_id from user_info where user_id = #{user_id}
